name: armonik.api
description: This project is part of the [ArmoniK](https://github.com/aneoconsulting/ArmoniK) project. In particular it is a consitutent of its [Core](https://github.com/aneoconsulting/ArmoniK.Core) component which, among its main functionalities, implements several gRPC services aiming to provide a user with a robust task scheduler for a high throughput computing application.
